lines.text: The sahib doesn't believe in unemployment.
H thinks it should all be done away with.
He says the only way to do away with unemployment is to do away with employment. If nobody worked, there couldn't be any unemployment, and so the sahib hasn't done a speck of work in four years.
Well, what can you do besides look rather too good-looking?
Well, I... I'm, a championship swinner, play a reattling good gane of tennis, fair golf, and I rumba like the Angel Gabriel.
Do you think people ever change?
Not us... ever. We just aren't any good.
